# TicketOrigin Enum

What is the origin of this ticket

* Unknown = 0
* Email = 1
* SMS = 2
* Fax = 3
* Phone = 4
* Facebook = 5
* Twitter = 6
* Internal = 7
* CustomerCentre = 8
* EMarketing = 9
* AutoGenerated = 10
* Chat = 11
* Form = 12

## Usage
* [ticket](ticket.md).origin - This table contains the tickets (requests) of the system. Its purpose should be evident.
